name: Mother and Baby Care
body:
![Unicorn](https://github.com/unicorn.png)

#**Who are we?**#

We are a one-stop platform service portal, and act as a third party for parentâ€™s baby and childcare needs, with relevant products and services catered to parents ranging from expectant mothers to those with children up to 10 years old. We will function as an intermediary, offering physical products like diapers, baby-strollers as well as services ranging from babysitting to enrichment lessons.



##Our Sponsors##

Visit our friendsite: [Mothercare](http://www.mothercare.com.sg/)
